ops.description: Bank[6][1] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:42}); // Dio
“Boy, if you're reading this letter,
then you must've won.
I know you earned it.”{PAUSE}“I heard about Dyne from Ester.
Now that you won, I'm granting
you and your friends a full
pardon, and setting you all free.”{PAUSE}“And by way of apology,
I have a little gift for you
to use on your journey.”{PAUSE}“Sorry I couldn't be there to tell you this
in person, but I'm a very busy man.
{CHOICE}{CHOICE}{CHOICE} Sincerely,
{CHOICE}{CHOICE}{CHOICE} Dio”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:45}); // {Aeris}
“{Cloud}, this is great!!
The assistant manager just stopped
by and dropped off a 'buggy'!”{PAUSE}“Now we can go over
'deserts' and 'rivers', no problem.”{PAUSE}“OK, {Cloud}.
I'll be waiting outside.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:46}); // {Cloud}
(Hmm? The letter continues…){PAUSE}“P.S.
I recently met Sephiroth.
I'll bet he's pretty popular
with boys your age.”{PAUSE}“Why don't you get his autograph?
He was heading toward
{CYAN}Gongaga, south of the river{WHITE}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // Joe
“Then, until we meet again,
{Cloud}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Joe
“Hey, Ester
you're looking pretty as usual.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Joe
“Nice to meet you,
{Cloud}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Joe
“If you're with Ester, then…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // Joe
“So why did you get put down?”{PAUSE}“Sorry…we're not supposed
to ask about the past here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // Joe
“Pretty interesting…
I have a feeling that we'll meet again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // Joe
“Then, until we meet again,
{Cloud}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // “Don't get cocky.
Skills don't matter once
you get in the race…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // “I got nothing to say.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // Ester
“I'll be right back.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // Ester
“Let me introduce you,
{Cloud}.”{PAUSE}“This is Joe, one of
the top Chocobo Jockeys.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // Ester
“Right! He's an up and coming jockey.”{PAUSE}“He'd only been down there a day and
already he made it up here!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // Ester
“I'm going to check on the Chocobo.
You just wait here for a while.”

dialogStrings: Waiting Room

Man
“You new?”

Ester
“Hi, Joe.”

Joe
“Hey, Ester
you're looking pretty as usual.”

Ester
“Thanks.”

Ester
“Let me introduce you,
{Cloud}.”{PAUSE}“This is Joe, one of
the top Chocobo Jockeys.”

Joe
“Nice to meet you,
{Cloud}.”

Joe
“If you're with Ester, then…”

Ester
“Right! He's an up and coming jockey.”{PAUSE}“He'd only been down there a day and
already he made it up here!!”
“What!?”

Joe
“Oh, I see…”

Joe
“So why did you get put down?”{PAUSE}“Sorry…we're not supposed
to ask about the past here.”

Joe
“Hmm.”

Joe
“Pretty interesting…
I have a feeling that we'll meet again.”

Joe
“Then, until we meet again,
{Cloud}.”

Ester
“I'm going to check on the Chocobo.
You just wait here for a while.”

Ester
“I'll be right back.”
“I got nothing to say.”

“Don't get cocky.
Skills don't matter once
you get in the race…”

“The race will start
in a few moments.
Will the jockeys for the next race
please proceed to the paddock.”{PAUSE}“I repeat…”

Ester
“{Cloud}.”

Ester
“Thanks for waiting.
I registered you
in the next race.”

Ester
“This is a Chocobo I prepared myself.
He should do well.”

Ester
“So…
Remember how to ride?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Uh, how was it again?
{CHOICE}Yeah, I got it

Ester
“Then, good luck.”

Ester
“Let's see
First use {PURPLE}[ASSIST]{WHITE}
to choose either AUTO or MANUAL.”{PAUSE}“This lets you control the Chocobo
yourself or let it run on its own.”{PAUSE}“But it's pretty hard to make the
Chocobo run the way you want it to.
If the Chocobo doesn't like you,
it won't listen.”{PAUSE}“Then, you're stuck…”{PAUSE}“But, most of the Chocobos
I have are mellow
and you should be able to
handle them.”

Ester
“When you're riding,
use {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} to Speed Up
and {PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE} to Slow Down.”

Ester
“If you go faster than the
Chocobo can handle, it'll
quickly lose its stamina.”

Ester
“Use the Directional buttons to
move the Chocobo left and right.”{PAUSE}“Use {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE}
to get a boost of speed.”{PAUSE}“But this makes your stamina
run out faster.”

Ester
“Some Chocobos are bad-tempered
and can't pace themselves.
They'll lose their
stamina quickly.”{PAUSE}“Those Chocobos should be
set on Manual
to slow them down.”{PAUSE}“Finally, some advice
for the restless, once
the first and second Chocobo
cross the goal line,”{PAUSE}“Push {PURPLE}[START]{WHITE}
to end the race.”

Ester
“Too bad.”

Ester
“You were so close.”

Ester
“I expected more from you.”

Ester
“That was a tough break.”

Ester
“Let me find a better Chocobo for you.
Wait here for a while, OK?”

Ester
“If you couldn't win
with that last Chocobo…”

Ester
“All right, I'll go get
the best Chocobo there is!”

Ester
“You gotta be kidding me!?
There aren't any other
Chocobos better than the last one!”

Ester
“Well, if you really want to win,
just push {PURPLE}[ASSIST]{WHITE}
and try the 'AUTO' mode.”

Ester
“Congratulations!!
Now you're home free!”

Ester
“Oh yeah,
the owner told me to give this
letter to you if you won.”

Dio
“Boy, if you're reading this letter,
then you must've won.
I know you earned it.”{PAUSE}“I heard about Dyne from Ester.
Now that you won, I'm granting
you and your friends a full
pardon, and setting you all free.”{PAUSE}“And by way of apology,
I have a little gift for you
to use on your journey.”{PAUSE}“Sorry I couldn't be there to tell you this
in person, but I'm a very busy man.
{CHOICE}{CHOICE}{CHOICE} Sincerely,
{CHOICE}{CHOICE}{CHOICE} Dio”

{Cloud}
“A gift?”

{Aeris}
“{Cloud}, this is great!!
The assistant manager just stopped
by and dropped off a 'buggy'!”{PAUSE}“Now we can go over
'deserts' and 'rivers', no problem.”{PAUSE}“OK, {Cloud}.
I'll be waiting outside.”

{Cloud}
(Hmm? The letter continues…){PAUSE}“P.S.
I recently met Sephiroth.
I'll bet he's pretty popular
with boys your age.”{PAUSE}“Why don't you get his autograph?
He was heading toward
{CYAN}Gongaga, south of the river{WHITE}.”

{Cloud}
“Sephiroth…”

Ester
“I guess this is goodbye.”{PAUSE}“Yeah.
Well, if you ever get your
own Chocobo, come back again.”{PAUSE}“I'll take care of your registration
and everything.
I'll see you again.”
